sentences.english: Can I deposit my money through the ATM?
sentences.chinese: 我可以通过自动柜员机存钱吗？

sentences.english: Please suppress the use of all ATM Services for the above-mentioned Primary Account.
sentences.chinese: 请终止有关上述基本户口所有自动柜员机服务。

sentences.english: We launched the first cardless ATM.
sentences.chinese: 我们推出了首个无卡式自动柜员机。

sentences.english: They also supply the control devices in the ATMs which operate at the speed a customer expects of an ATM.
sentences.chinese: 他们还供应ATM柜员机上的控制装置。

sentences.english: I don't stand on the Cash point or ATM if the line is too big.
sentences.chinese: 我不站在现金点或自动柜员机，如果线是太大。

sentences.english: Will you also want a bank card to withdraw your funds from a bank ATM?
sentences.chinese: 您需要一张银行卡好让您能在自动柜员机领钱吗？

sentences.english: ATM stands for automatic teller machine.
You can change your PIN at the ATM.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在自动柜员机上修改密玛。

sentences.english: My card was eaten by the ATM.
sentences.chinese: 我的卡被柜员机吞掉了。

sentences.english: English is an language that we can use it at the banks' ATM.
sentences.chinese: 银行的自动柜员机可以使用中文和英语两种语言。

sentences.english: But could you tell me where the nearest cash machine is?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我附近有柜员机吗？

sentences.english: Miss Zhao went to the ATM with her bank card.
sentences.chinese: 赵女士持银行卡到银行自助柜员机前准备取钱。

sentences.english: You can change your PIN at the BTM.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在自动柜员机上修改密码。

sentences.english: The card may be retained by the ATM if the PIN is incorrectly keyed in for SIX TIMES consecutively.
sentences.chinese: 如连续六次按入错误密码，卡会被自动柜员机没收。

definition: to withdraw money from a bank
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
ICBC (Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)/abbr. for 工商銀行|工商银行[Gong1 Shang1 Yin2 hang2]
to withdraw money/to take money out of the bank
a device used to check money and detect counterfeit bills
